BBOB-2015 - Sunday, July 12th 2015, GECCO 2015, Madrid

Location: Patio 3
9:00-10:50 Evaluating Algorithm Components (chaired by Youhei Akimoto)
09:00 - 09:45 Dimo Brockhoff:
Introduction to Blackbox Optimization Benchmarking slides
09:45 - 10:20 Petr Pošík* (Czech Technical University in Prague) and Petr Baudiš (Czech Technical University in Prague):
Dimension Selection in Axis-Parallel Brent-STEP Method for Black-Box Optimization of Separable Continuous Functions slides
10:20 - 10:50 Asma Atamna* (INRIA Saclay - Ile-de-France):
Benchmarking IPOP-CMA-ES-TPA and IPOP-CMA-ES-MSR on the BBOB Noiseless Testbed slides
11:10-13:00 Expensive Optimization (chaired by Petr Pošík)
11:10 - 11:30 Dimo Brockhoff:
Session Introduction slides
11:30 - 12:10 Lukáš Bajer* (Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic), Zbynek Pitra* (National Institute of Mental Health), and Martin Holena (Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic):
Benchmarking Gaussian Processes and Random Forests Surrogate Models on the BBOB Noiseless Testbed slides
12:10 - 12:30 Dimo Brockhoff* (INRIA Lille - Nord Europe), Bernd Bischl (Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München), and Tobias Wagner (TU Dortmund University):
The Impact of Initial Designs on the Performance of MATSuMoTo on the Noiseless BBOB-2015 Testbed: A Preliminary Study slides
12:30 - 12:45 Dimo Brockhoff:
Wrap-up of the BBOB-2015 Results slides
12:45 - 13:00 Open Discussion
attractivity of the workshop
what should we change?
what should be keep?

A '*' indicates the speaker(s) for each talk.
